     "postinstall": "rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm run build",

discussion_comments.comment_body:
Same, we would not build deps anymore, combine build steps should work.
```json
 {
    "build": "tsc -b . && webpack --config webpack.config.js",
    "build:publish": "npm run build && rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../electron/core/pre-install"
}
```
cc @hiento09

discussion_comments.comment_body:
Since we are not building deps anymore, combining build steps should work. This is also to shorten root build command. 
```json
 {
    "build": "tsc -b . && webpack --config webpack.config.js",
    "build:publish": "npm run build && rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../electron/core/pre-install"
}
```
